softwareproject

Class Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • softwareproject.Argument
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Optional, Positional

    public class Argument
extends java.lang.Object
    The Argument class sets and retrieves an object's value, description, type, shorthand, and specifies whether it is required or not. It also includes an enum Type that specifies whether the argument is a string, int, boolean, or float.
